
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VPalTiming.cpp
          VPalTiming.h
          VPalTiming__Syms.cpp
          VPalTiming__Syms.h
          VPalTiming__Trace.cpp
          VPalTiming__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS PalTiming.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/PalTiming.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VPalTiming STATIC
    VPalTiming.cpp
    VPalTiming__Syms.cpp
    VPalTiming__Trace.cpp
    VPalTiming__Trace__Slow.cpp
    PalTiming.v
)

target_compile_options(VPalTiming PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VPalTiming PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VPalTiming verilated)
